title: Umbrella

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -  Give a player an umbrella at night. Anyone who visits them tonight is redirected to the next valid target on the player listâ€”next highest number, the end of the player list loops back to the first person.

fields.value: -  You may self-target, because you would just be using one of your own umbrellas.
